item.title: ‘MoGlicked’ weekend powers AMC, Cinemark shares higher on record attendance
item.description: Thanksgiving weekend box-office traffic reflected the popularity of “Moana 2” and “Wicked.”

item.title: S&P Climbs, Dollar Strengthens as Yuan, Euro Weaken
item.description: U.S. stocks were mixed. The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite climbed, while the Dow industrials ticked lower.

item.title: Why Super Micro’s stock is soaring after completion of accounting probe

item.title: Intel delivers long-awaited CEO change, but that doesn’t make its stock a buy

item.title: French stocks and bonds hit by no-confidence fears
item.description: French stocks and bonds were hit on Monday on worries the country’s government may fall.
